TopicTitle: Project:STARK A plan for space suit space ships.

Articles.Content:
Yes im tyring to make an Iron Man type flying suit. (though more like Iron Monger) Its not been going well on the steering front.

Pics are here: http://imgur.com/a/mUwsC

I will try to update this post as more tests are done.

Also if you make your own Flying suit post it here!

Edited April 25, 2013 by MinerEdgar
Actully should this be in the Ships thread? If it should could a friendly mod move it?

lols, thats cool! I like!

If you're not averse to using mods, check out the pandora rover (its the curiosity look-a-like mod), it has a couple of v small radial engines which are part of its skycrane. They are pretty powerful with good ISP and vectoring, might help with getting him to fly. How heavy is it?
Add a hatch in the back for kerbals to enter
Right now the craft is unmanned with a probe core in the chest. But the head does have a Mk 1 pod in it.
I was just thinking we might start seeing more of these types of craft when the seat gets released.
Anyone want to try to make their own?
Actually it looks more like a Metal Gear than an Iron Man suit
